data.actual_result: The warning disappears, but the chat remains disabled and messages can't be sent
data.expected_result: The warning is still open and can be dismissed
data.short_description: [Overlay] Alt+tab when mass mention warning is open disables the chat box
data.steps_to_repro: - Attempt to mention everyone in a large server in the overlay where you have permissions to - When the warning opens, alt+tab and switch window - Switch back and observe the chat box
